content: this is a legal case that is currently ongoing in the county court varaždin the case started in 2019 and is related to a previous case that was heard in the municipal court split in 2018 the dispute is about a coownership of a real estate property the firstinstance court determined that the coownership should be dissolved and ordered one party to reimburse the other party for necessary costs the other party appealed the decision claiming violations of the civil procedure law upon review the court found that the firstinstance court did commit violations but correctly determined the method of dissolution the court also addressed objections raised by the other party regarding investments in the property the court upheld the decision and rejected the appeal
